name: Invader Zim: Alien Autopsy
description:
Click the blue text. There is a back arrow in the upper left corner of the screen to go back. 

I do not own Invader Zim.

I wrote this for Halloween 2019.  Screenshot is from the episode: "Dark Harvest."  Open for twine commissions!

Inspired by an AU Idea from:  

https://subtleshenanigans.tumblr.com/post/187527735588/invader-zim-headcanons-so...

Dib and Zim become friends to a degree (more like frenemies). They either go on hunts together for like Bigfoot and such, or Zim (being hella chaotic and destructive) helps Dib lure and capture aliens for dissection. (If Zim is willing to steal organs you can’t tell me he wouldn’t be down with this.)
